## tooling-pkg-mgr package

Tooling functions to implement support for feature modules.

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [PackageManager](./tooling-pkg-mgr.packagemanager.md) | Enumeration of the supported package managers |

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [rxSupportsYarn()](./tooling-pkg-mgr.rxsupportsyarn.md) | Tests if we have a <code>yarn</code> installation |
|  [rxYarnHasPackage(aName, aRange)](./tooling-pkg-mgr.rxyarnhaspackage.md) | Tests if we have a matching package installation |
